title: Episode 38: The Mountain
itunes:title: Episode 38: The Mountain
description:
Humans have always wandered off into unexplored territory. It’s a key part of our identity to leave safety behind in pursuit of adventure. Those journeys, though, don’t always end in success. In fact, sometimes they end in horrible tragedy.

* * *

This episode of Lore was sponsored by:

Stamps: Print your own postage and shipping labels from your home or office. Start your 4-week trial today, and claim your $110 bonus offer, which includes postage and a digital scale. Just visit Stamps.com, click on the microphone in the top-right of the homepage, and type LORE.

Foot Cardigan: Life is too short to wear boring socks. Get one new pair of fun, colorful socks delivered to your front door every month. Start your subscription today at FootCardigan.com/lore, and use coupon code LORE2 to save 10%.

Harry’s: Want a better shave without the high prices? Go visit Harrys.com and use the offer code LORE to save $5 off their amazing starter kit. That's a month of shaving for $10 + free shipping!

* * *
